title: Killing Eve
subtitle: Series 1: 1. Nice Face
editorial_subtitle: Box Set. A deadly, obsessive game of cat and mouse

synopses.small: When a politician is murdered, an MI5 security officer must protect the only witness.
synopses.medium: Thriller in which a security operative hunts for an assassin. When a Russian politician is murdered, MI5 security officer Eve must protect the only witness.
synopses.preview: Thriller series in which a security operative hunts for an assassin.
synopses.editorial: Eve craves excitement. Villanelle craves destruction. They both need each other.

title: Killing Eve
subtitle: Series 1: 2. I'll Deal With Him Later

synopses.large: After being fired by Frank for the debacle in the hospital, Eve is stunned to be presented with her dream opportunity - a secret, off-the-books department, a mission she is truly invested in and the chance to build and lead her own team. Her target is Villanelle, who is still fulfilling her missions all over Europe, leaving a trail of bodies and intrigue behind her.
synopses.small: Eve joins a secret MI6 unit tracking Villanelle and the shady organisation she works for.
synopses.medium: Thriller series in which a security operative hunts for an assassin. Eve gets a dream opportunity to join a secret MI6 unit tracking Villanelle.
synopses.editorial: Villanelle is ordered to take a break – but she’s never one to do as she’s told.

synopses.large: When Villanelle kills a Chinese colonel at a kink clinic in Berlin, Eve and Bill travel out to investigate. While they follow a number of promising leads, Villanelle enjoys the cat-and-mouse nature of their proximity. But as they draw closer, Eve comes to realise that this is much more than a game.
synopses.small: When Villanelle kills a Chinese colonel in Berlin, Eve and Bill travel out to investigate.
synopses.medium: Thriller series. When Villanelle kills a Chinese colonel at a kink clinic in Berlin, Eve and Bill travel out to investigate.
synopses.editorial: Villanelle enjoys getting close to her nemesis Eve – and Niko’s worried about her safety.

synopses.large: Intelligence from Berlin suggests the existence of a mole, prompting Eve to carry out a surveillance operation. Meanwhile, Villanelle is sent to England to assassinate a member of British Intelligence. She wonders if it could be Eve.
synopses.small: Villanelle is sent to England to assassinate a member of British Intelligence.
synopses.medium: Thriller series. Intelligence suggests the existence of a mole, prompting Eve to carry out a surveillance operation. Villanelle is sent to England for her next mission.
synopses.editorial: Forced to be part of a team, Villanelle must kill a member of the British secret service.

title: Killing Eve
subtitle: Series 1: 5. I Have a Thing About Bathrooms

synopses.large: With the mole retrieved from Villanelle's clutches and secured in a safe house, Eve and the team finally have a chance to get information that could lead them not only to Villanelle but also to whoever is calling the shots. But with Villanelle still at large and in England, will any of them actually be safe until she's caught?
synopses.small: Eve and the team finally have a chance to get information.
synopses.medium: Thriller series in which a security operative hunts for an assassin. Eve and the team finally have a chance to get information.

title: Killing Eve
subtitle: Series 1: 6. Take Me to the Hole!

synopses.large: Villanelle is sneaked into a Russian prison to tie up one of her own extremely risky loose ends. But Eve and Carolyn are on their way to Moscow to meet Carolyn's contacts in Russian intelligence, hoping to get into the same prison to collect the final pieces of the puzzle.
synopses.small: Villanelle is smuggled into a Russian prison.
synopses.medium: Thriller series in which a security operative hunts for an assassin. A female assassin is imprisoned in Russia. Eve and Carolyn negotiate access.
synopses.editorial: Villanelle is sneaked into a Russian prison – and Eve and Carolyn are on their way too.

title: Killing Eve
subtitle: Series 1: 7. I Don’t Want to Be Free

synopses.large: Carolyn brings unwelcome news and a change of priorities, but Eve is closer than she’s ever been to Villanelle, and is finally going to meet Anna. Why would she give up the hunt now? Kenny has some revelations that make Eve question the true purpose of their entire mission. Meanwhile Villanelle is still in prison, now in solitary confinement, waiting for the rescue organised by Konstantin that never seems to come.
synopses.small: Carolyn brings news and a change of priorities, but Eve is closer than ever to Villanelle
synopses.medium: Carolyn brings unwelcome news and a change of priorities, but Eve is closer than ever to Villanelle, and is finally going to meet Anna. Why would she give up the hunt now?
synopses.editorial: With Eve finally meeting Anna, why would she give up the hunt? Kenny has a revelation.

synopses.large: Villanelle is still on the run, but she has a hostage and she has a plan. Eve, Carolyn and Kenny are still in Russia, but old secrets coming to light have led to tension in the group. Can Eve finally get to Villanelle before the whole operation comes crashing down around them?
synopses.small: Villanelle is still on the run, but she has a hostage and she has a plan.

synopses.editorial: Can Eve get to Villanelle before the whole operation comes crashing down around them?
